orders.title: Veerhealth Care Ltd - 511523 - Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
orders.summary: We are enclosing herewith the Press Release on receipt of order from one of India''s leading chain of pharmacy for manufacturing and supply of Hair Care products.
orders.pdf_extract:
Date: 6th August, 2025 
To, 
BSE limited 
Department of Corporate Services 
P. J. Towers, 
Dalal Street, Fort, 
Mumbai- 400001. 
Scrip Code: 511523 
Dear Sir/ Madam, Sub: Press Release on Receipt of Order. 
We are enclosing herewith the Press Release on receipt of order from one of India's leading chain 
of pharmacy for manufacturing and supply of Hair Care products. 
We request you to kindly take the same on record. 
Thanking You. 
Yours truly, 
For Veerhealth Care limited 
Bhavin S. Shah 
Mana
